location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '19'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View along the shore at Linga [Lingeh]. Three men and two children stand on the shore watching a model dhow floating on the water. In the background a large dhow is is beached, presumably for repairs.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘19’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
